sentences.en: During the Soviet era and its immediate aftermath, the region was officially known as "Middle Asia and Kazakhstan".
sentences.cn: 在苏联时代和紧随其后的一段时期，该地区的官方名称为“中亚和哈萨克斯坦”。

sentences.en: Food for the ordinary Soviet troops and NCOs was very poor.
sentences.cn: 苏联普通士兵的伙食很糟糕。

sentences.en: Germany began to attack the Soviet Union in 1941.
sentences.cn: 德国在1941年开始进攻苏联.

sentences.en: Gorbachev failed to keep the component parts of the Soviet Union together.
sentences.cn: 戈尔巴乔夫没能把苏联各成员国团结在一起。

sentences.en: He became an outspoken opponent of the old Soviet system.
sentences.cn: 他成为旧的苏联体制直言不讳的抨击者。

sentences.en: In 1990, 200,000 Soviet Jews resettled on Israeli territory.
sentences.cn: 在1990年，20万名苏联犹太人在以色列重新定居。

sentences.en: In the late 1970s Laos fell within the orbit of Vietnam and the Soviet Union.
sentences.cn: 20世纪70年代末，老挝被纳入了越南和苏联的势力范围。

sentences.en: On the basis of my own observations, I should like to elucidate a few problems concerning the Soviet Union and China.
sentences.cn: 我想根据我的观察, 说明几个和苏联和中国都有关系的问题.

sentences.en: Soviet expansionism was considered a real threat.
sentences.cn: 苏联的扩张主义被认为是真正的威胁。

sentences.en: the countries of the former Soviet Union
The islands were seized by the Soviet army in the dying days of the second world war.
sentences.cn: 这些岛屿是在二战末期被苏联军队占领的。

sentences.en: The Soviet Union's grip on Eastern Europe loosened.
sentences.cn: 苏联对东欧的控制已经放松。

sentences.en: These planes are outclassed by the most recent designs from the former Soviet Union.
sentences.cn: 苏联的最新产品要远比这些飞机性能优越。

sentences.en: We are Siamesed to the Soviet Union.
Zhukov was a marshal of the former Soviet Union.
sentences.cn: 朱可夫是前苏联的一位元帅.

words.tran_cn: 苏维埃（代表会议）；委员会；代表会议

phrases.tran_cn: 前苏联（1922-1991，首都莫斯科Moscow，位于欧、亚洲）

trans.tran_cn: 苏联的；苏维埃的；委员会的
trans.tran_en: Soviet is used to describe something that belonged or related to the former Soviet Union

trans.tran_cn: 代表会议，劳工代表会议，苏联，苏维埃
trans.tran_en: an elected council in a Communist country
